Class mainmenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainmenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class mainmenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

    Main Menu and Game Play of St.Augustine Monopoly

    This is the mainmenu and gameplay for game
    Number of Players: 1-4
    Since:
    2019-01-06

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      stamonopolycharacters characterspanel
      Panel from JPanel of java swing that allows players to choose their player colour.
      javax.swing.JButton ExitButt
      Exit button in the main menu from JButton of javaswing
      This button exits and closes the console/program
      javax.swing.JButton InstrucButt
      Instruction button in the main menu from JButton of javaswing
      This button goes to the instruction page - learn how to play the game
      joingame joinpage
      Panel from JPanel of java swing
      This page is for the player (client) who decides to join another player's game
      Player must input player's (server) IP address to join the game
      AnimationMonopolyPanel monopolypanel
      Animation Panel for all of the graphics and designs for the whole gameplay
      javax.swing.JButton PlayButt
      Play button in the main menu from JButton of java swing
      This button leads to the actual gameplay of St.A monopoly
      serverpanel playpage1
      Panel from JPanel of javaswing
      This page allows you to decide whether or not you want to be a server or client
      SuperSocketMaster ssm
      Mr.Cadawas' SuperSocketMaster that entails code for server and client
      startgame startpage
      Panel from JPanel of java swing
      This page is for the player (server) who decides to start the game
      Player must wait for other players (clients) to input IP address and then start the game.
      java.lang.String[][] strChance
      The Chance cards in the St.Augustine Monopoly Board
      [0] - Card Number
      [1] - Statement
      [2] - Effect of the card (location/money check)
      [3] - Money or Location effect (cost/location)
      java.lang.String[][] strCommunity
      The Community Chest Cards in the St.
      java.lang.String[][] strProperties
      The properties in the St.Augustine Monopoly Board
      Array: [40][13]
      [0] Subject
      [1] Teacher
      [2] Price
      [3] Rent
      [4] Rent with 1 houses
      [5] Rent with 2 houses
      [6] Rent with 3 houses
      [7] Rent with hotel
      [8] Mortgage
      [9] Boolean - if the property is owned (if you landed on it)
      [10] Colour of property
      [11] Number of Houses on the property (4 houses = hotel)
      [12] intPlayer that owns the property
      javax.swing.JFrame theframe
      Frame of the program from JFrame of javaswing
      Resolution: 1280,720
      javax.swing.JPanel thepanel

      Instructions panel from JPanel of javaswing
      This entails all of the instruction content of the game
      javax.swing.Timer thetimer
      Timer that plays throughout the whole gameplay

        public stamonopolycharacters characterspanel
        Panel from JPanel of java swing that allows players to choose their player colour.

        public javax.swing.Timer thetimer
        Timer that plays throughout the whole gameplay

      • strProperties

        public java.lang.String[][] strProperties
        The properties in the St.Augustine Monopoly Board
        Array: [40][13]
        [0] Subject
        [1] Teacher
        [2] Price
        [3] Rent
        [4] Rent with 1 houses
        [5] Rent with 2 houses
        [6] Rent with 3 houses
        [7] Rent with hotel
        [8] Mortgage
        [9] Boolean - if the property is owned (if you landed on it)
        [10] Colour of property
        [11] Number of Houses on the property (4 houses = hotel)
        [12] intPlayer that owns the property

      • strCommunity

        public java.lang.String[][] strCommunity
        The Community Chest Cards in the St. Augustine Monopoly Board
        These are randomly generated
        Array: [30][3]
        [0] - Card Number
        [1] - Statement
        [2] - Money Given or Owed

      • strChance

        public java.lang.String[][] strChance
        The Chance cards in the St.Augustine Monopoly Board
        [0] - Card Number
        [1] - Statement
        [2] - Effect of the card (location/money check)
        [3] - Money or Location effect (cost/location)
